description:
• Do you use LinkedIn and think there must be more to it?
  • Do you wish there was a way to bring people to you, rather than you having to do cold calling?
  • Do you need more leads for your business?
  • Are you stuck for marketing ideas for your business?

If the answer is yes to any of these questions then this course is for you. The Instructor has been using the tips and strategies set out in this course with great effect.

LATEST: course updated again March 2016!

About this course:

  • Over 1,300 happy students
  • 5 star reviews
  • Full lifetime access
  • Updated regularly: all future updates and extra lectures for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee
  • I use LinkedIn for my business on a daily basis AND train people regularly, so I KNOW the problems people often encounter

The course shows you how to ensure your profile is completed in a way that will attract the right people to you, how to set up a company page, join in and set up groups and how to create a strategy to bring in leads.

The course comprises online demonstrations of each step that you need to take to get LinkedIn working for your business along with downloads and written information.

There is a handy summary and checklist at the end of each section along with documents that can be downloaded to consolidate your learning.

The course works best if you work on your own Linkedin profile as you proceed.

There are some sections where you will need to do some planning in order to achieve your business objectives. I will either cover this in the Introductory lecture in each Section, or will include this at the relevant point.

Time spent on these planning sections, will save a huge amount of time later, and will help you achieve your business and marketing objectives.

This course is ideal for anyone who needs to gain more leads for their business, including:

Business owners

Managers

Sales professionals

Entrepreneurs

You are welcome to connect with me on LinkedIn - just let me know that you are taking the course. I will be happy to help with any queries.
title: LinkedIn Success Strategies:For People Who Hate Cold Calling
